error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to your MMS.
error.unknown_error: Unknown error connecting to your MMS.
error.min_firmware_required: You need to update your MMS to the latest Firmware.

confirm.title: Configure your MMS
confirm.description: Click SUBMIT to set up the Autonomic {name} ({host}).

user.title: Configure your MMS
user.description:
Please enter the host name or IP address of the Autonomic MMS.

Note: Your MMS must be running firmware version 6.1.20180215.0 or greater and must be already configured for use with any Autonomic amplifiers you may own.
